name: pokemon-battle
description: Monorepositorio para aplicaciones backend (NestJS) y frontend (React) de pokemon-battle

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:install: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm ci && npm run install:all && npm run dev
